item.description: p5-instance-div # new p5((p5) = { let img; function preload() { img = loadImage('https://hips.hearstapps.com/hbu.h-cdn.co/assets/17/04/1600x800/landscape-foliage-color-blindness-1.jpg?resize=980:*'); } function setup() { createCanvas(747, 373); image(img, 0, 0, width, height); let d = pixelDensity(); loadPixels(); for (var y = 0; y 80){ pixels[index+0] = r+70 } } } updatePixels(); } }, "pacman" );
